thread.title: Iris
thread.title_full: McElhinneys Department Store reviewed by Iris

author: Iris
title: Iris
text: Great products and a great fast and efficient service ..very happy indeed. Purchased Newbridge Clear Stones Ballerina Pendant for a wonderful little girl making her Confirmation and very happy to say she was more than happy as was my wish for her special day ..Thank you
